column1: "description": "This data provides All India (2001 to 2011) and State-wise (2008 to 2011) details on surfaced length of National Highways and surfaced length of State Highways as on 31st March for below standard single lane
column3: standard double lane and standard multi lane."

column1: "title": "All India And State-wise Length Of National And State Highways - By Width As On 31st March 2011 "
